mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_SUBSYS SET NAME_=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEY_=#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGO_=#{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT_=#{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_URL_=#{homeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCP_=#{descp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON_CLS_=#{iconCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_=#{sn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, IS_SAAS_=#{isSaas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECRET_=#{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_=#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME_=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY_=#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME_=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE SYS_ID_=#{sysId}
mapper.select: SELECT sm.* FROM SYS_SUBSYS sm RIGHT JOIN OS_GROUP_SYS gs on sm.SYS_ID_=gs.SYS_ID_ WHERE gs.GROUP_ID_=#{groupId} and sm.STATUS_='ENABLED' order by SN_

SELECT distinct sm.* FROM SYS_SUBSYS sm , OS_GROUP_SYS gs ,OS_REL_INST rel,sys_type_sub_ref ref,sys_inst_type type where sm.SYS_ID_=gs.SYS_ID_ and gs.GROUP_ID_=rel.PARTY1_ and sm.STATUS_='ENABLED' and rel.PARTY2_=#{userId} and rel.TENANT_ID_=#{tenantId} and sm.SYS_ID_=ref.SUB_SYS_ID_ and ref.INST_TYPE_ID_=type.TYPE_ID_ and type.TYPE_CODE_=#{instType} order by sm.SN_
SELECT * FROM SYS_SUBSYS sm WHERE sm.STATUS_=#{status} order by SN_ asc

SELECT * FROM SYS_SUBSYS sm ,sys_type_sub_ref ref,sys_inst_type t WHERE sm.SYS_ID_=ref.SUB_SYS_ID_ and ref.INST_TYPE_ID_=t.TYPE_ID_ and t.TYPE_CODE_=#{instType} and sm.STATUS_=#{status} order by SN_ asc
SELECT * FROM SYS_SUBSYS order by SN_ asc
